name: Chess!
description:
Chess! is a realistic online chess game built with the power of Unreal Engine 5 and seamlessly integrated with Lichess, the world's premier open-source chess platform. Chess! delivers an immersive and visually stunning experience, allowing you to:

  • Practice against AI
  • Compete with millions of Lichess players
  • Track your online ranked ELO
  • Dive into a lifetime of offline puzzles (500,000+)
  • Free flying camera, play from any angle
  • Enjoy an array of customizable options: Boards, Pieces, Locations, and much more

Looking for an over-the-board realistic chess game with a large online community?
Chess! integrates with Lichess, one of the largest online chess communities in the world with millions of active players! Allowing you to matchmake, within seconds, and compete against other players exactly at your level.

Features:



  • Next-Generation Graphics: Witness the power of Unreal Engine 5 as it transforms the classic game of chess into a breathtaking visual spectacle. Enjoy lifelike textures, realistic lighting, and multiple scenes with intricate details that elevate your gaming experience to new heights.

  • Lichess Integration: Seamlessly connect to the Lichess platform, allowing you to engage in exciting games with advanced AI, track your ELO, practice with puzzles, and participate in ranked Lichess matchmaking for a truly competitive experience. (Chess! online play requires you to login to an active Lichess account. Lichess is free to sign up and use.)

  • Advanced AI and Human Opponents: Test your skills against sophisticated AI opponents or challenge real players from around the world, providing endless opportunities to refine your strategies and grow as a chess master.

  • Millions of Offline Puzzles: Dive into a vast library of puzzles that cater to all skill levels, from beginner to grandmaster. Sharpen your tactical acumen and learn from the best with our expertly curated collection of over 500,000 chess challenges.

  • Relaxing Scenes: Immerse yourself in the soothing landscapes of our carefully selected relaxing music and scenes, designed to enhance your focus and create the perfect atmosphere for strategic gameplay.

  • Extensive Customization: Personalize your chess experience with a wealth of customization options. Choose from a wide array of unique chess pieces, boards, and stunning locations, allowing you to create your own bespoke chess environment.

Embark on an unforgettable chess journey with Chess!
